name: part_003
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Life Will Change' by Ouro Kronii.
Transition sequence between performances featuring cityscape and stage graphics.
Performance of the song 'X-encounter' by IRyS.

subtitles.original: Life Will Change
subtitles.english: Life Will Change

subtitles.original: Move fast without breaking
subtitles.english: Move fast without breaking

subtitles.original: Can't hold on or life will change
subtitles.english: Can't hold on or life will change

subtitles.original: And our voices ring out, yeah
subtitles.english: And our voices ring out, yeah

subtitles.original: Took the mask off to feel free
subtitles.english: Took the mask off to feel free

subtitles.original: Fought it out in the debris
subtitles.english: Fought it out in the debris

subtitles.original: Now we know that life will change
subtitles.english: Now we know that life will change

subtitles.original: And this time
subtitles.english: And this time

subtitles.original: Another figment of your ailing old mind
subtitles.english: Another figment of your ailing old mind

subtitles.original: I'm just as real as
subtitles.english: I'm just as real as

subtitles.original: I'm just as dangerous
subtitles.english: I'm just as dangerous

subtitles.original: As you so know, you'll find
subtitles.english: As you so know, you'll find

subtitles.original: A taste of your own meds
subtitles.english: A taste of your own meds

subtitles.original: Firing every breath
subtitles.english: Firing every breath

subtitles.english: Fire inside your head

subtitles.original: Your heart
subtitles.english: Your heart

subtitles.original: And as your people pray
subtitles.english: And as your people pray

subtitles.original: Try so hard to evade
subtitles.english: Try so hard to evade

subtitles.original: Your empire of old
subtitles.english: Your empire of old

subtitles.original: Of old
subtitles.english: Of old

subtitles.original: And you know we were out there
subtitles.english: And you know we were out there

subtitles.original: Swatting flies in the making
subtitles.english: Swatting flies in the making

subtitles.original: Your empire for the taking
subtitles.english: Your empire for the taking

subtitles.original: Can't hold on or life will change
subtitles.english: Can't hold on or life will change

subtitles.original: And our voices ring out there
subtitles.english: And our voices ring out there

subtitles.original: Took the mask off to feel free
subtitles.english: Took the mask off to feel free

subtitles.english: Fought it out in the debris

subtitles.original: Now we know that life will change
subtitles.english: Now we know that life will change

subtitles.original: X-encounter
subtitles.english: X-encounter

subtitles.original: 飛べない　ここからじゃ
subtitles.english: I can't fly from here.

subtitles.original: 横顔眺めているだけじゃ　無力そう
subtitles.english: Just staring at your profile, I seem so helpless.

subtitles.original: 嘆いても　この背を誰も押さない
subtitles.english: Even if I grieve, no one will push my back.

subtitles.original: GOING OUT!
subtitles.english: GOING OUT!

subtitles.original: 飛び方を忘れていた
subtitles.english: Of the birds who forgot how to fly,

subtitles.original: 鳥達の嘆きのヴォイス
subtitles.english: is a voice of lamentation.

subtitles.original: 凍てつく無機質な世界に　何を望むの？
subtitles.english: What do you wish for in this frozen, inorganic world?

subtitles.original: そうだけどね
subtitles.english: That's true, but...

subtitles.original: 確実な希望がもう僕の中に
subtitles.english: ...a certain hope is already within me.

subtitles.original: GOING OUT!
subtitles.english: GOING OUT!

subtitles.original: 何かできるかなんて
subtitles.english: Whether I can do something,

subtitles.original: もうやってみなきゃわからない
subtitles.english: I won't know until I try.

subtitles.original: 走り出した　始まりは
subtitles.english: I've started running; the beginning...

subtitles.original: きっと生まれる前から決まっていた
subtitles.english: ...was surely decided before I was even born.

subtitles.original: 羽を揺らし　強く地面を蹴って
subtitles.english: Shaking my wings, I kick the ground hard.

subtitles.original: 君の元へ羽ばたこう
subtitles.english: I'll fly to where you are.

subtitles.original: RAVEN! Fight keep holding on!
subtitles.english: RAVEN! Fight keep holding on!

subtitles.original: 何度もループの中で
subtitles.english: Time after time, within the loop,

subtitles.original: ああ　この場所で　もう止められない
subtitles.english: ah, in this place, it can't be stopped anymore.

subtitles.original: 運命(カルマ)の真下で
subtitles.english: Directly beneath fate...

subtitles.original: 僕にできることが　どんなに僅かでも
subtitles.english: ...no matter how little I can do.

subtitles.original: その身体に背負うもの
subtitles.english: What you carry on that body,

subtitles.original: その痛みは分け合える日まで
subtitles.english: until the day we can share that pain.
